Hekedder was an infamous barbarian shaman from the Frozen North and the creator of the Blood Iron short sword who was active many years before the late 13 century DR.
Hekedder was a man of wicked morals who created the crude enchanted blade imbued with necromantic magics. He gifted the sword to his cousin and, in the years that followed, the cousin and all subsequent wielders of the blade found themselves hated because of the Blood Irons necromantic taint, which was much reviled by the barbarian tribes of the North. Hekedders creation became infamous among his people long before the , with them thinking even uttering the swords name to be a curse.
